synopsis.text: Productions heiress, Eriko Tamura, is the sole daughter of Tamura Kousuke, a music industry mogul, and Minako Tamura, a celebrated idol singer. Born with a natural gift for singing, Eriko has always been enamored with the glitz and glamour of her parents' media empire. However, when a devastating car accident claims her father's life and leaves her mother in a coma, Eriko's world is shattered. Entrusted to the care of her father's best friend, Mr. Uchida, Eriko embarks on a journey into the world of singingâ€”a path her parents had always discouraged. Amidst the challenges and her uncle's attempts to sabotage her career, Eriko perseveres, rising to become an idol and capturing the hearts of fans across Japan. Will Eriko's success and determination be enough to overcome the obstacles ahead and bring her mother back from the brink?
